term.title: double-strand polymer

item.text: A polymer the macromolecules of which are double-strand macromolecules.

notes.item: A polymer, the macromolecules of which are spiro macromolecules is termed a spiro polymer.
A polymer, the macromolecules of which are ladder macromolecules is termed a ladder polymer.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2287. 'Glossary of basic terms in polymer science (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2304 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122287)

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
